data.text: @Nicoletta0602 why spend money on the kids when we can pay some equity audit consultant $75,000

@bendslc @Nicoletta0602 @phantom1835 Let's fire them and let hardworking taxpayers keep their money.  

Computers and parents can do a better job of teaching kids to read.

@phantom1835 @Nicoletta0602 I used to defend the teachers saying they have no time to individualize reading instruction for struggling readers but now I see they have time for way less important yet destructive things. So yes, let’s get them trained up on individualizing reading instruction instead of SEL.

@Nicoletta0602 When this 🤡 uses “White cis-gendered males” immed I DGAF what they’re  saying.That’s my family and most of America & close to all of what you or anybody else in has was made by us. Get over it and move on. I’d like to but fcking 🤡s like this ❤️to divde us. Tired of it.
@Nicoletta0602 I 100% agree. Unfortunately that's not what their using it for.

@phantom1835 There is never enough money for academics, dyslexia services, ESL. 

They won't lose it if they use it for those things.
@Nicoletta0602 An acquaintance of mine has similar information gathered from an FOIA request of even costlier amounts at a local school
@Nicoletta0602 The entire governments policy is if you don't use it you lose it. They will piss money away just to make sure they don't lose it. Every department operates this way.
@Nicoletta0602 Remember under queen Gina the state received 1.2 Billion dollars, and 900 plus million vanished, I think it is still happening.
